ocean.question: I swim in the ocean and have lots of colorful scales. What am I?

hints.text: 🐟 I live underwater.
🌈 I can be many different colors.
🐠 I'm smaller than a whale.

ocean.question: I am very big and blue. Boats sail on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am made of water.
🛳️ Ships travel across me.
🐳 I am home to many animals.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the sea. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I am an invertebrate.
🖐️🖐️🖐️🖐️ I have a lot of arms.
🎨 I can change color.

ocean.question: I live in a shell and crawl slowly on the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I carry my home on my back.
🐌 I am very slow.
🏖️ You can find me on the beach.

ocean.question: I'm a very large fish with sharp teeth. People are scared of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I am a predator in the ocean.
🦷 I have rows of sharp teeth.
🎬 There are movies about me.

ocean.question: I am a treasure chest found under the sea, what is inside of me?

hints.text: 💰 Pirates might want me.
💎 I am sparkly and valuable.
✨ I'm not always gold.

ocean.question: I am a small creature that lives in tide pools and has a hard shell with pinchers. What am I?

hints.text: 🦀 I walk sideways.
🤏 I can pinch you.
🌊 I live near the shore.

ocean.question: I am a very large mammal that lives in the ocean, I sing beautiful songs and have a blowhole. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am the largest animal on Earth.
🎶 I communicate with songs.
💨 I breathe through a hole on my back.

ocean.question: I am a home built underwater made of coral and lots of fish live there. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 Many colorful fish live there.
🧱 It's made of tiny animals.
🏞️ It's a very diverse underwater ecosystem.

ocean.question: I am a long, thin fish that hides in the sand and can deliver a painful shock. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I can give you a zap!
🐍 I look like a snake.
🏖️ I bury myself in the sand.

food.question: I am yellow, you peel me, monkeys love me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I am a favorite snack of primates
💛 I'm the color of sunshine
📦 I come in my own wrapper

food.question: I am round, I am red, and I grow on trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I need sunshine and water to grow
❤️ Snow White took a bite of me
🥧 You can make pie with me

food.question: I am white, I am fluffy, and you eat me with a spoon. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I come from a cow
🥣 I'm good with cereal
❄️ I look a bit like snow when I am cold

food.question: I am long, orange, and rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I'm a root vegetable
👁️ They say eating me helps you see better
🐰 Bugs Bunny's favorite snack

food.question: I am small, green, and grow in a pod. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am a vegetable that is often served as a side dish
👨‍🌾 I grow on vines
🍲 I am often found in soup

food.question: I am made of flour, water and yeast, and I am baked in an oven. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 I am often eaten with butter
🥪 You can make a sandwich with me
🔥 I need heat to be made

food.question: I am a sweet treat, made of milk, cream and sugar, and I am frozen. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I am often eaten in a cone
🍧 I am a popular dessert
🥶 I am very cold

food.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy skin, and I am green inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🥝 I am often eaten with a spoon
🟢 I am a good source of Vitamin C
🦫 I am named after a New Zealand bird

food.question: I am a type of food that is made from fermented soybeans. What am I?

hints.text: 🥢 I am often eaten in Asian countries
🌱 I am a source of protein
🧊 I can be eaten raw or cooked

food.question: I am a type of mushroom that is often used in Italian cooking. What am I?

hints.text: 🇮🇹 I am a popular ingredient in pasta dishes
🍄 I am a type of fungus
🌰 I have a nutty flavor
